title: Performance and application boundary analysis of solar PV/T heat pump system
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00381K, Paper
Yuhang Han, Lejun Feng, Zhihao Fu, Jun Sui
The solar photovoltaic/thermal (PV/T) heat pump system is a new type of system that integrates solar PV/T conversion with heat pump technology. It is capable of comprehensive utilisation of solar...
